title: New Villa Logo
content:
The new Aston Villa logo has been released today.

[http://s173.photobucket.com/albums/w65/cresswell84/?action=view&current=...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016220308/http:/s173.photobucket.com/albums/w65/cresswell84/?action=view&current=AVFC001.jpg "http://s173.photobucket.com/albums/w65/cresswell84/?action=view&current=AVFC001.jpg")

Any chance anyone could tell me what typeface 'Prepared' has been written in?

Andy
author: andy19at

comments.content: It looks like a customised verion of '_Chelsea_ Studio', which is perhaps a little ironic.

haha.. no way will check it out!

..maybe they want to emulate them!?

Hi there

Can anyone tell me the font 'AVFC' is in please.

Vic
